amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws pertaining to aviation safety or airport security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of two amendments, offered en bloc and printed in the Congressional Record as amendment Nos. 69 and 70, to exempt federal mandates pertaining to protecting aviation or airport security.

action.text: On agreeing to the Collins (IL) amendments (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 256 (Roll no. 25).
